Summary: Came right above horizon flew with changing elevation also darting left and right before finally disappearing totally
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother in law yelled at us saying come out here and look at this. It's another one. All of us went outside and watched this thing slowly move above the horizon and dart left and right. Dropping sometimes and then going back up. It did this for a few mins. We all watched then suddenly it took off fast. Like it wasn't even there
trends: There has been one other sighting in Browning
There were no other sightings in Browning on or around April 19th 2013
